This is easily the eighteenth worst surgery I've ever been involved in.

Anyways we've attached a leg to his arm stump. I hope he won't notice. What's you do with the tentacles? Of and just go ahead and shove the femur back in there. I'm sure he won't notice. And more glowing green crap! Christ what sort of amateur hour bullshit are we running here?!
